title: retro font
content:
this reminds me of old Movie Posters..

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [kuba-logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725000510/http:/typophile.com/files/kuba-logo.png) | 14.32 KB |
author: mirimiri2

comments.content:
I may be wrong but all repeating letters are different (2 /u, 2 /h).  
You may like [B-Movie Retro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725000510/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typonauten/b-movie-retro) by Die Typonauten and [Reporter](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725000510/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/reporter) by Carlos Winkow.
